page.title: 19AROUND HALE
page.content: The country side around Hale is beautiful especicially 'Off the Beaten Track.' There is Farnham Park which links Hale and Farnham.Its facilities include,golf,ruby,cricket and football. Near the town there is the old Castle dating back to 1138 and with many addition as in use today as an international breefing centre. To the west lanes lead to quiet valleys hiding manor houses and farms. It is hard to belive the town is so close. Also hidden here is a thriving riding stable and near the army ground is a purpose built B.M.X. track. THe North of the village is bordered by army ground left in its natural state.
